field.name: description
field.value:
I'm trying to update the code generated from the project generator but I get his error when lauching my browser:
System.ApplicationException: You have to provide a small configuration to use MonoRail. Check the samples or the documentation in <0x000f8> Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Configuration.MonoRailConfiguration:GetConfig () in <0x0000d> Castle.MonoRail.Framework.MonoRailServiceContainer:InitConfiguration () in <0x00015> Castle.MonoRail.Framework.MonoRailServiceContainer:Start () in (wrapper remoting-invoke-with-check) Castle.MonoRail.Framework.MonoRailServiceContainer:Start () in <0x00069> Castle.MonoRail.Framework.EngineContextModule:Init (System.Web.HttpApplication context) in <0x00197> System.Web.Configuration.HttpModulesSection:LoadModules (System.Web.HttpApplication app) in <0x0007d> System.Web.HttpApplication:InitOnce (Boolean full_init) in <0x00019> System.Web.HttpApplication:Start (System.Object x)
Attached is my web.config file which I haven't changed and worked before I updated to last build.
